result.arabic_text: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
result.translation: Wanapo pokea wapokeaji wawili, wanao kaa kuliani na kushotoni.
result.footnotes: Watakapo kutana Malaika wawili walinzi, mmoja anakaa kuliani, na mwingine anakaa upande wa kushoto, wakiviandika vitendo vyake.
